mapper.select: select T1.id, T1.softwareName, T1.supportROM, T1.interfaceLanguage, T1.APKName, T1.softwareSize, (SELECT valueName FROM data_dictionary WHERE typeCode = 'APP_FLATFORM' AND valueId=T1.flatformId) AS flatformName, (SELECT categoryName FROM app_category WHERE app_category.id=T1.categoryLevel1) AS categoryLevel1Name, (SELECT categoryName FROM app_category WHERE app_category.id=T1.categoryLevel2) AS categoryLevel2Name, (SELECT categoryName FROM app_category WHERE app_category.id=T1.categoryLevel3) AS categoryLevel3Name, (SELECT valueName FROM data_dictionary WHERE typeCode = 'APP_STATUS' AND valueId=T1.status) AS statusName, T1.downloads, (SELECT versionNo FROM app_version WHERE app_version.id=T1.versionId) AS versionNo, T1.appInfo, T1.logoPicPath from app_info AS T1 WHERE T1.id=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM app_info where APKName=#{param1}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM app_info where id=#{param1}
